title: AskyBlock
author: 这里小雨.
txt_content: 创建或加入空岛不消失物品如何设置

replies.author: 本诺先森
replies.txt_content:
askyblock配置文件夹 config

resetinventory: false

改为false即可

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
看一下 config.yml 里面
resetinventory: true
这一项是否为true

replies.author: IceCC
replies.txt_content:
配置文件Askyblock/config.yml
(Ctrl+F 键)搜resetinventory
resetinventory: true

将"true"改为"false"即可
resetinventory: false

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
我迷惑了 是我的英语不够好吗
   # Reset inventory - if true, the player's inventory will be cleared when they start
   # or restart and island. Default is true.
   # Note: if you have MultiInv running or a similar inventory control plugin, that
   # plugin may still reset the inventory when the world changes.
   resetinventory: true复制代码
这明明写的是设为true才会清空背包啊 设为false就不清空啊 ???
